Reviews.Title: Used Iphone 4S 64gb
Reviews.Author: Lsoto79
Reviews.Content: Item is working and like new conditions. As described, ESN was clean ready to activate. The phone works as if it was a new phone. I am happy.

Reviews.Title: THE BEST UPGRADE
Reviews.Author: Arness
Reviews.Content: GOTTA LOVE MORE SPACE SO I PURCHASED THE 64G. LOVE THE IPHONE 4S BUT IT WAS THE WAY THE SELLER MADE SURE I WAS 100% SATISFIED WITH CONCERNS AS TO ME GETTING IT CONNECTED AND I'M TRULY HAPPY WITH MY SERVICE FROM THIS SELLER. THANKS

Reviews.Title: Good item
Reviews.Author: Juan
Reviews.Content: Good item get it such a great bundle ;) i bet u guys that no one can beat such a great one time sell ;)

Reviews.Title: So happy!
Reviews.Author: Nicole Plumlee
Reviews.Content: I replaced a lower gb iPhone with this fabulous 64 gb jewel!  So happy I did because it has tons and tons of room and was in perfect condition!

Reviews.Title: Iphone 4s
Reviews.Author: SPDK1971
Reviews.Content: This phone is so easy to use and a great phone which just support my private and business activities so much !

Reviews.Title: I must have
Reviews.Author: RobSegura82
Reviews.Content: I've been an android user for a long time, but when sprint finally got the iPhone I had to jump on the band wagon. I love my phone
